hero.description: I am a software engineer who is curious about every stage of development, open to learning, and passionate about creating.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I graduated with honors in June 2025 from Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University with a GPA of 3.07 in Computer Engineering. As a solution-oriented and collaborative engineer who is eager to learn, I am now looking to begin my professional career in a company where I can contribute to real-world projects. I believe that with my sense of responsibility and willingness to grow, I can quickly bring value to any team I join.
